thread.title: Jim Carrey pays tribute to ex-girlfriend Cathriona White after her death in LA

title: Jim Carrey pays tribute to ex-girlfriend Cathriona White after her death in LA
text:
Jim Carrey pays tribute to ex-girlfriend Cathriona White after her death in LA Jim Carrey pays tribute to ex-girlfriend Cathriona White after her death in LA 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Hollywood actor Jim Carrey has paid tribute to his ex-girlfriend Cathriona White, saying learning of her death was like being ‚Äúhit with a lightning bolt‚Äù. 
The 30-year-old, born in Ireland, was found dead in her home on Monday, according to the Los Angeles County Coroner‚Äôs Office. (David Crotty/patrickmcmullan.com/AP) 
In his statement, he said White was a ‚Äúkind and delicate Irish flower, too sensitive for this soil‚Äù. 
He added: ‚ÄúMy heart goes out to her family and friends and to everyone who loved and cared about her. We have all been hit with a lightning bolt.‚Äù 
Jim, 53, dated make-up artist White briefly in 2012 and the pair were photographed together earlier this year. 
The last two photos posted on Carrey‚Äôs Twitter account were credited to White. Your true self is unfathomably immense, and I mean that as a compliment. ;^P (photo by Cathriona White) pic.twitter.com/uRHUYWE7VL 
‚Äî Jim Carrey (@JimCarrey) September 1, 2015 Grand Central, NYC. ;^} (photo by Cathriona White) pic.twitter.com/N8QbQQDFLu 
‚Äî Jim Carrey (@JimCarrey) September 16, 2015 
She last posted on the social networking website on Thursday: Signing off Twitter, I hope I have been a light to my nearest and dearest. ‚úåüèºÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏è to yo all 
‚Äî Cathriona white (@littleirishcat) September 24, 2015 Share article 
Her death is being investigated as a possible suicide, with an examination scheduled for Wednesday. Promoted Stories
